overview: 2008 saw a legacy continue. The Rip Curl Pro Search 'Somewhere' In Indonesia' stayed true to the event's DNA: the world's best surfers in the world's best waves. From mind-blowing hell pits in round 1 to flawless, roping lefts for the late rounds, upon event's end, there was no doubt; the world witnessed the best waves for an ASP World Tour event since Mexico in '06. The search continues...
tagline: 2008 saw a legacy continue. The Rip Curl Pro Search 'Somewhere' In Indonesia' stayed true to the event's DNA: the world's best surfers in the world's best waves.
title: The Stories from the Search
